title: For That He looked Not upon Her - complex attitude

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Gascoigne uses literary elements and techniques to convey the complex attitude of the speaker.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Gascoigne uses literary elements and techniques to convey the complex attitude of the speaker.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
